		}
		return nil
	})

## Import



cam set_policy_version_config can be imported using the id, e.g.

```sh
$ pulumi import tencentcloud:Cam/setPolicyVersionConfig:SetPolicyVersionConfig set_policy_version_config set_policy_version_config_id
```
